item.description: CHANGE OF MEETING PLACE MEET ACROSS THE ST FROM WATERPLACE PARK ON THE PROVIDENCE PLACE SIDE OUTSIDE OF 'FIRE AND ICE' JOHANNAH WILL BE THERE WITH HER GROUPS Since 1994 Waterfire has grown to !00 bonfires along the three rivers in Providence RI. adjacent to Providence Place in the heart of downtown Providence. Music,dancing, street performers and food vendors of all sorts make this a memorable evening...Men and women dressed all in BLACK feed the fires continuously from mysterious boats...Gondolas with romantic couples sipping champagne cruise the river...The best way to view waterfire is by stolling the 6 block length of the Providence river... Don't miss the street performers and food vendors hidden in little nooks and crannies all along the streets behind the river . The further you walk the more you will see! Parking and directions to follow later You may want to carpool Fires are lit at 7:38 Try to get there earlier...Meet at the west end directly across from the entrance to Providence Place at the stone steps leading down to the Waterfire area around 715 i WILL SEND MY CELL# TO YES PEOPLE ON THE DAY OF THE EVENT IN CASE YOU ARE LATE OR CAN'T FIND US!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Green Tornadoes Hat Meet on the Providence Place side of the park outside of 'Fire and Ice'
item.name: Waterfire in Providence
